name: Wheel of Life: Coaching and Assessment Tool for Life Coach
author: Kraft Plugins

sections.description:
👉 Wheel of Life Pro is now available.
👉 View Demo.

Powerful Tool for Coaches to Generate Leads and Grow Coaching Business

As a career, health or life coach, do you want to easily enable visitors on your website to get a “bird’s eye” view of their lives and capture leads? Or do you want to help your clients to assess each area of life, and help them achieve a profound balanced life?

If your answer is yes, then the Wheel of Life tool is for you.

With the Wheel of Life coaching tool, you can generate leads by letting visitors on your website take assessments. l You can also help your client see how balanced their life is and motivate them to create a fulfilling life. While your clients visualize all the important areas of their lives at once, you can guide them to maintain the perfect balance they need.

Key Features of Wheel of Life Assessment Tool

  • Unlimited Assessments – You can easily create an unlimited wheel of life assessments for your clients. Your clients can take the assessment multiple times to analyze how balanced their life is. This even encourages them to sign up for coaching services from you to create a fulfilling life.

  • Customization Options – Wheel of Life is simple and easy to use. You can fully customize the different settings of the assessment tool, such as the visual appearance of the wheel, choices in color options and many more.

  • Call to Action Integration – To encourage your clients and your website visitors to signup for your services or book an appointment, you can add Call to Action at the end of the assessment. This will help you bring more leads and grow your coaching business.

  • Easily Embed Across Your Website – You can easily embed the assessment across your website in posts or pages using shortcode and button blocks.

  • Social Sharing – Your clients and website visitors can quickly share their assessment results on different social media. This will help to increase social media visibility about your business and generate leads.

  • Email Report – At the end of the assessment, your clients and website visitors can result of the rest to their email their results for future reference.

  • Compatible with Any Theme – This plugin works smoothly with any theme.

Wheel of Life Tool Pro Features

  • Analytics Dashboard – With the Pro version, you can get how your clients and website visitors are engaged with the assessments. You can see the total number of assessments taken, the popular assessments and who recently took the assessment.

  • User Registration – With this feature, you can allow your clients and website visitors to register on your website to take assessments from their profile, view their assessment history and much more. You can also promote helpful resources on the dashboard.

  • More Insights on Members – You can see the progress of your registered users from your dashboard. You can easily review your clients’ profiles, see their assessment history and much more.

  • Customizable Email Templates – You can customize the email templates that are sent during registration, forgot password and email report.

  • Resources Sharing – You can add several helpful resources to inform your clients and generate more leads. The helpful resources are displayed on the user dashboard.

  • More Chart Types – You get 3 different chart types for displaying the assessment which can be configured independently for each assessment.

  • Custom Call to Action – In addition to the Global Call to Action, you can configure different CTA for each of your assessments. This feature will offer more control to customize the CTA for each assessment and will help you bring more leads.
sections.faq:
What is Wheel of Life?

The Wheel of Life is an assessment tool used in life coaching to help people assess and manage their life priorities. It’s a diagram with six spokes, each representing a different area of life: health, wealth, relationships, personal growth, contribution and fun/leisure.

The idea is to score how satisfied you are with each area on a scale of 0-10, with 10 being the highest. This gives you a good overview of where you’re doing well and where you could use some improvement.

The Wheel of Life coaching tool can be a helpful tool in setting goals and creating a plan to achieve them. It’s also a useful way to check in with yourself periodically to see how you’re doing. If an area of your life is suffering, it can help you to identify what needs to change.

Who is the Wheel of Life plugin for?

Wheel of Life plugin is for coaches who want to let their website visitors take an assessment, generate leads and grow their coaching business. It is also for the coaches who want to let their clients get a “bird-eye” view about their life and help them to achieve profound balance.

How do I use the Wheel of Life?

The Wheel of Life assessment tool is easy to configure and simple to use. We have step-by-step tutorials on how you can use it. Once you create, publish and add the assessment you have created, your users can take the assessment.

How long does it take to take the assessment?

It usually takes less than a minute to complete the assessment. If you have added many areas of life to rate, it might take some more time than usual.

Does Wheel of Life work with any theme?

Yes, the plugin can be used with any theme of your choice. It will work smoothly without any issues.

sections.reviews:
Great addition to an online practice

By vingogly on January 22, 2024

Works pretty well, looks professional, and providing the client with the option to repeat the assessment helps them and me track their progress. Improvements I'd like to see include:

User interface is confusing for a first-time user, and more seriously ... if the user makes a mistake, there's no cancelling out of the wheel or backing up to the previous entry to correct the mistake. I'd call this a pretty serious UI shortcoming. If there's a way around this, I'm not seeing it.

Integration with Zapier would be helpful; this would enable better integration with the other tools I use in my practice (ClarityFlow, Paperbell, and Brevo).

Great Plugin, Excellent Support.

By mrpaulbrady on April 24, 2023

Fantastic plugin with a lot of customisable options to make it fit with the flow of your site. Wanted to disable the view wheel button after setting it up and got support over the weekend to solve that very quickly by an extremely helpful engineer. Thanks a mil.

Highly recommend this plugin!

Wheel of Life assessment is brilliant

By bevbaxter7 on January 3, 2023

I hhave added the Wheel of Life to my new website and find it an incredibly useful tool. I love it.

Bev Holistic Wellness Coach

Stunning!

By queencoach on April 24, 2022

I really love this tool! It’s one of the assessments I start my coaching with and love to see how easily people enjoy it online! Great support, great team behind the tool.. what else? 5stars

Great Assessment Plugin and Support

By lnorten on April 12, 2022

I was searching for a WP plugin to do a business diagnostic survey as a lead generation tool. After searching, I found The Wheel of Life, which provided an easy survey UI and graphic display of the results. The Wheel of Life WP plugin is a great assessment tool. I started with the free version to test for my application and quickly upgraded to the Pro version. It's super simple to set up and test. I had a few initial questions that were quickly replied to by Ashish in support. It works great and the graphic display is very cool for users. I'm absolutely thrilled with the plugin and the support. It's a 5 Star recommendation from me!

Excellent plugin and support

By Tahiel on March 24, 2022

The plugin is super easy to install and use. Visually, it's simple and beautiful both in the front end and back end. Support is fast to reply and super patient and helpful even for the free version of their plugin. Would truly highly recommend.

An indispensable Coaching Tool

By hknznz on January 29, 2022

The first step of personal development journey is, from where to begin to generate self awareness. Also; as you know the change in life happens in the moment. In this case, as a coach, we need to obtain an objective data of our client's current awareness. While searching for a reliable awareness plugin for my website, I found The Wheel of Life plugin. I used the free version of the plugin for sometime and after receiving positive feedbacks from my clients, upgraded to the pro version. After switching to the Pro version; my clients, who created their Wheel Of Life user accounts on my site, are able to reach all their charts and their time based evolution journeys from their own screens. Another caption that is important to me and that I should mention is; the developers are giving quick responses to the issues that arise during installation and implementation period. Also; the developers are taking your suggestions into consideration and develop their plugins in line with your suggestions.
